1 IO 1.1 Data Sources 1.1.1 Alpha Vantage Alpha Vantage offers free access to pricing data including: Stock Time Series Data; Physical and Digital/Crypto Currencies (e.g., Bitcoin); Technical Indicators and Sector Performances. The data are available in JSON and CSV format via REST APIs. The Quantmod and the alphavantager packages offer a lightweight R interfaces to the Alpha Vantage API. getSymbols('AAPL', src="av", output.size="full", adjusted=TRUE, api.key='your API key') plot(AAPL$adjusted) 1.1.2 Quandl 1.1.3 IEX
